document_data.mainbody:
thumb|A feast at a 295x295px
This is a list of dishes known to exist in the Realms, excluding breads, drinks, sauces, and desserts. It includes information on the cuisine of the dish, establishments and cities where they could be found, and each of the dishs main ingredients. Cuisines are broken down into the nation of origin, or general area of the content that has shared culinary influences, and well as racial cuisines for non-human people of the Realms.
